text: Krunoslav Hulak (25 May 1951 - 23 October 2015) was a Croatian chess master. He was awarded the International Master title in 1974, and the grandmaster title in 1976.Hulak, Krunoslav FIDE Chess Player Personal Page. Ratings.fide.com. Retrieved on 2012-11-10. Hulak was born in Osijek, Croatia. Hulak died in Zagreb, Croatia, aged 64. ==References== ==Other websites== * Tužna vijest za hrvatski šah: Bio je omiljen... title: Krunoslav Hulak
